alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued September 20 at 1:52PM MDT until September 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM PDT THURSDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 6500 Feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Clearwater Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Backcountry travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The more intense showers could drive snow levels down below 6500 feet.
info.instruction: Outdoor recreationalists should be prepared for winter conditions. Snowfall could impact roads and cold temperatures may result in hypothermia.
